blogPost.excerpt: Update your phones look with over 4,500 aesthetic icons made by pro designers and trending Dribbble artists. Our iOS app makes it easy to browse aesthetic themes and download any icon you want –from minimal monochromes to Futurama characters. Plus, it’s free!
blogPost.body: Update your phones look with over 4,500 aesthetic icons made by pro designers and trending Dribbble artists. Our iOS app makes it easy to browse aesthetic themes and download any icon you want –from minimal monochromes to Futurama characters. Plus, it’s free!
blogPost.title: Aesthetic Icons App by Icons8 - Personalize your iPhone with clean and modern icon themes
blogPost.author: Ivan

localize.description: 更新您的手机外观超过4500个美学图标，由专业设计师和流行的Dribble艺术家制作。我们的iOS应用程序使浏览美学主题和下载任何你想要的图标变得容易-从最小的单色到未来人物。另外，这是免费的！
localize.tagline: 用干净、现代的图标主题个性化您的iPhone

localize.description: 更新您的手機外觀超過4500個美學圖標，由專業設計師和流行的Dribble藝術家製作。我們的iOS應用程序使瀏覽美學主題和下載任何你想要的圖標變得容易-從最小的單色到未來人物。另外，這是免費的！
localize.tagline: 用乾淨、現代的圖標主題個性化您的iPhone
